---
name: "Feature Request"
description: "Suggest a new feature or enhancement for PatchFest Racer."
title: "[FEATURE] "
labels: ["enhancement"]
---

## Summary
Briefly describe the feature you want to propose.

## Why Is This Needed?
Explain the motivation behind this feature.  
Why does the project or user benefit from it?

## Proposed Implementation
Describe how you think this feature can be implemented.  
Include any technical details or suggestions if applicable.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Clearly defined expected behavior  
- [ ] Feature works without breaking existing systems  
- [ ] Proper tests or manual verification steps included
